en: "'As he pulled into the driveway of No. 4, "'the first thing he saw, and it didn't improve his mood, "'was the tabby cat he had spotted that morning. "'It was now sitting on his garden wall. "'He was sure it was the same one. "'It had the same markings around its eyes. "'Shoo!' said Mr Dursley, loudly.
zh:
他刚刚驶入四号车道，第一个映入眼帘的就是早上他见过的那只花斑猫，这并没有使他的心情好转。这时猫正坐在他家花园的院墙上。他肯定这只猫和早上的是同一只：眼睛周围的纹路一模一样。
"去……去！"德思礼先生大喝道。
